content.raw:
This got messed up when I switched around my bookmarks because apparently bitbucket can't track pull requests based on individual heads/bookmarks, just named branches.  I'll try to sort it out, but might just close this.

See https://bitbucket.org/site/master/issue/6705/cant-create-pull-request-from-hg-bookmark
content.html:
This got messed up when I switched around my bookmarks because apparently bitbucket can't track pull requests based on individual heads/bookmarks, just named branches. I'll try to sort it out, but might just close this.

See https://bitbucket.org/site/master/issue/6705/cant-create-pull-request-from-hg-bookmark
